title: Leverage, Part 1
description: This is the first installment of the three part serial, LeverageA MAN WHO BELIEVES MONEY CAN BUY ANYTHING.Boston Kincaid is ruthless when comes to getting what he wants - and from the minute he sees Julianna Holly, he wants her in his bed - no matter the cost.WILL DISCOVER SOMETHING PRICELESS...When Julianna finds herself within Boston's crosshairs, she doesn't stand a chance. Boston knows just how to tighten the screws so that she'll agree to anything. But while Julianna will allow him her body, she vows he will never have her heart.But neither realize how one indecent proposal will change their lives forever.
author: Alexx Andria
